snippet.textDisplay: 这不是一个完全公平的对比。因为只简单的按国家来进行换算！要知道有的国家大有的国家小。人口是完全不一样的！比方美国3亿多的人口排放竟然高达15%。如果美国人口和中国一样多是14亿人口。那简单换算是不是美国排放量高达60%？再比方德国有8200万人口，排放量2%。如果换算到中国的人口规模14亿人口的话。那全世界排放量岂不是达到34%？每个人都要生存工作，吃饭和生活。所以每个人都是排放二氧化碳的个体。脱离人口数量，简单按照国家来划分是不科学也是不公平的对比！

snippet.textDisplay: 美国的军事预算是中国的3倍，核武库是中国的20倍，但中国却被描绘成侵略者。美国的航母打击群不断在中国沿海航行，而中国却是麻烦制造者。美国在全球拥有800多个军事基地，中国拥有1个，但中国是一个威胁。中国是最大的贸易伙伴，几乎每个人都使用南海贸易路线，但不知何故，中国想干扰自由通道，我猜想只是为了阻止我们自己的贸易。中国人均二氧化碳排放量不到美国人均排放量的五分之一，尽管中国是世界工厂，但全球变暖要归咎于中国。西方对中国的指责接二连三，但如果中国说出它的战狼外交官的话。不需要上历史课就可以认出这些废话，你所要做的就是睁开眼睛，你就会看到我们今天生活的世界是多么虚伪。

snippet.textDisplay: China's population is large, so its average emissions are high. On average, the United States has twice as many people as China.
snippet.textOriginal: China's population is large, so its average emissions are high. On average, the United States has twice as many people as China.

snippet.textDisplay: As a Chinese, I know very well that the country with the largest carbon emissions in the world today must be my country, which is almost beyond doubt. But China has been planting forests in large quantities since two decades ago. In the past ten years, the scale and number of thermal power plants have been gradually shut down and reduced. There are too many people in this country, and everyone wants to live a better life, but they are still doing their best to protect the environment. However, Western countries have endlessly promoted and suppressed through the media for political purposes. It seems that everything China does is wrong, but in the end they question why the Chinese government does not give people a better life. It's nice to see bloggers describing the status quo objectively and without political perspective, I believe my country is still trying to do its part and I'm living this philosophy as an ordinary citizen
snippet.textOriginal: As a Chinese, I know very well that the country with the largest carbon emissions in the world today must be my country, which is almost beyond doubt. But China has been planting forests in large quantities since two decades ago. In the past ten years, the scale and number of thermal power plants have been gradually shut down and reduced. There are too many people in this country, and everyone wants to live a better life, but they are still doing their best to protect the environment. However, Western countries have endlessly promoted and suppressed through the media for political purposes. It seems that everything China does is wrong, but in the end they question why the Chinese government does not give people a better life. It's nice to see bloggers describing the status quo objectively and without political perspective, I believe my country is still trying to do its part and I'm living this philosophy as an ordinary citizen

snippet.textDisplay: Animal agriculture is the #1 source of deforestation. Not to mention famine , drought , and disease. I know it sounds ironic that its a large contributor to famine, but think of it this way, we use over 60% of our crops to feed animals. We feed 70 billion livestock a year, why can't we feed 8 billion humans? This food for our food requires a lot of water and of land. 56% of U.S water actually goes to animal *feed alone*. If eating meat was about survival, its in our best survival to stop now, unless we wanna die of drought and famine. Also for the record, animal farming (because it requires monocropping to feed these billions of animals for food) damage the soil and deplete it of natural b12. This isn't sustainable. Our demand is too high and red meat is linked to cancer and many diseases.
snippet.textOriginal: Animal agriculture is the #1 source of deforestation. Not to mention famine , drought , and disease. I know it sounds ironic that its a large contributor to famine, but think of it this way, we use over 60% of our crops to feed animals. We feed 70 billion livestock a year, why can't we feed 8 billion humans? This food for our food requires a lot of water and of land. 56% of U.S water actually goes to animal *feed alone*. If eating meat was about survival, its in our best survival to stop now, unless we wanna die of drought and famine. Also for the record, animal farming (because it requires monocropping to feed these billions of animals for food) damage the soil and deplete it of natural b12. This isn't sustainable. Our demand is too high and red meat is linked to cancer and many diseases.

Who can change it: human beings 

Is it worth it?
Hmmmmm, well that’s the difficult question. Because you know what is the fastest way to change it? Everybody stop breeding for a couple of generations. Is it ethical to make them do that?

Wellllll…. That is the rub

snippet.textDisplay:
中国🇨🇳的新能源汽车取得了很大的进步，这是对维护全球气候做出的一大贡献。作为一个中国人，我所看见最直观的就是街上的新能源汽车越来越多了（尤其是网约车，基本上都换成了新能源汽车）
然而美国🇺🇸正在要求加拿大🇨🇦减少对中国的锂电池出口，企图限制中国新能源汽车发展，我想这不是一个对环保有利的政策。
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: As you can see in the comment section of this video, everyone is pointing the finger at each other 🙄🙄. It is pointless stirring up nationalism. This isn't about who is accountable. It is about we, everyone of us, every government, must take actions, or it would be too late. Even though we live on lands with invisible boundaries we called countries, know we all are living in the same home and that we have just one Earth. This is the only home we have in this universe. Once Earth is no longer livable, nationalism wouldn't save you.
snippet.textOriginal: As you can see in the comment section of this video, everyone is pointing the finger at each other 🙄🙄. It is pointless stirring up nationalism. snippet.textDisplay: What's interesting is that even though this film is neutral in point of view, it doesn't blame anyone individually, and there are a lot of reliable data, it still makes both sides (Chinese and Westerners) feel dissatisfied 🤣 Westerners think they have done nothing wrong  The Chinese think that this video is discrediting the inherent thinking of Westerners (I think they may not have watched the video content at all), so it is better to enjoy life and destroy the earth as soon as possible instead of making everyone pay attention to protecting the environment.😂
